text: Obstructive Sleep Apnoea 02 Lowrisk 3-4 > INTERMEDIATE Screening: STOP-BANG criteria S —Snoring loud enough to be heard P — Pressure (hypertensiag through closed doors B—BMI235 T - Tiredness causing one to fall asleep A-Age 2 50 years during daytime activities on most days N — Neck circumference 2 40 cm (hypersomnolence) G — Gender (male) O — Observed apnoea events lasting > 10 seconds
